summary.span: 是以 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目和基本呈現方式特性為建置基礎之 WPF 核心層級實作的基底類別。

span.span: is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的基底類別，您可以從中衍生類別來代表特定的 3D 項目。 is an abstract base class from which you can derive classes to represent specific 3D elements. 3D 項目的輸入、 焦點，以及事件處理行為的許多一般定義於類別。Much of the input, focusing, and eventing behavior for 3D elements in general is defined in the class. 這包括鍵盤、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入及相關的狀態屬性的事件。This includes the events for keyboard, mouse, and stylus input, and related status properties. 其中許多事件會路由的事件，以及許多輸入相關的事件都有兩個反昇路由版本，以及通道事件的版本。Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event. 這些配對的事件通常是最大控制項作者感興趣的事件。These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors. 也包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]相關的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引發的方法所指定路由傳送來自於項目執行個體的事件。 also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance. A具有下列功能，特別由定義類別：A has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the class: - 可以回應使用者輸入 (包括控制項的輸入透過事件處理的傳送位置路由或路由的命令)。Can respond to user input (including control of where input is sent via handling of event routing or routing of commands). - 可以引發邏輯項目樹狀透過路由的路由的事件。Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree. > [!IMPORTANT] > 狀態會影響所有的項目所處理的輸入。 state affects all input handling by that element. 不會顯示的項目不會參與點擊測試，而不會收到輸入的事件，即使透過範圍將項目，則滑鼠如果可以看見。Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds of where the element would be if were visible. 不同於類別類別不包含配置。Unlike the class, the class does not include layout. 因此，類別不包含**量值**或**排列**方法。Therefore, the class does not include **Measure** or **Arrange** methods. 類別衍生自並維護它自己的集合藉由覆寫物件和仍然必須傳遞新物件加入至。A class that derives from and maintains its own collection of objects by overriding and must still pass new objects to . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立`Sphere`類別：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[UIElement3D 球體範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

param.span: 表示註冊處理常式，以便即使路由事件在其事件資料中標記為已處理，仍會叫用該處理常式。 表示以預設條件註冊處理常式，也就是如果路由事件已經標記為已處理，則不會叫用該處理常式。

span.span: to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
The default is .

param.span: 請勿定期要求重新處理路由事件。

span.span: Do not routinely ask to rehandle a routed event.

summary.span: 加入所指定路由事件的路由事件處理常式，會將此處理常式加入目前項目的處理常式集合中。

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

summary.span: 將 指定為 ，以針對已經由事件路由上另一個項目標記為已處理的路由事件，叫用提供的處理常式。

span.span: Specify as to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可行的方式處理低階輸入是一個複雜的工作。Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task. 許多控制項實作特定事件標示為已處理，而取代為另一個更具直覺性事件的行為。Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event. 一般而言，控制項只會將平台輸入的事件，為已處理，如果沒有這麼做一些設計用意。Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so. 在某些情況下，這些設計目的不可能的輸入事件的特定處理的需要。In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires. 這些案例是該註冊處理常式取代`handledEventsToo`為`true`適合。It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate. 但您不應該這麼例行性。But you should not do this routinely. 叫用處理常式以回應所有事件，即使處理將會使得您自己的應用程式事件處理邏輯。Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic. 如果處理常式邏輯的很大，可能會看到效能降低。You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial. 您應該保留附加尚未處理的情況下，您已經發現特定控制項所處理的事件，您仍然想要處理的應用程式邏輯在開發程序的事件處理常式的使用。You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic. 避免處理行為的某些事件控制組合類別的另一個技術是使用該事件預覽替代方案。Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative. 例如，如果標示為已處理的類別處理，您可以加入處理常式改為。For example, if is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for instead. 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業依預設，未啟用，且必須藉由設定刻意啟用至`true`。Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting to `true`. 超出此基本設定，拖放行為完全實作特定，不由定義或其他類型的基底項目類別。Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by or any other base element class. 某些控制項，例如，沒有預設行為。Certain controls, for example, , do have a default behavior. 如需拖放的詳細資訊，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 嘗試強制將滑鼠的捕捉給這個項目。

returns.span: 如果成功捕捉到滑鼠則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要擷取項目都必須啟用。To be captured, an element must be enabled. 檢查是否是`true`之前先呼叫。Check whether is `true` before you call . 如果呼叫傳回`true`，然後也`true`。If calling returns `true`, then is also `true`. 如果呼叫傳回`true`，然後在和引發事件，與事件中的項目報告資料其中方法呼叫。If calling returns `true`, then the and events are raised, with in the event data reported as the element where the method is called. 如果您強制擷取時，您可能會干擾現有的擷取 — 尤其是使用與拖放滑鼠相關聯的擷取。If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures—especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse. 若要清除所有項目從滑鼠擷取，請呼叫與`element`提供做為參數`null`。To clear mouse capture from all elements, call with the `element` parameter provided as `null`. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 嘗試強制將手寫筆的捕捉給這個項目。

span.span: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.

returns.span: 如果成功捕捉到手寫筆則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stylus was successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠根據基礎的預設手寫筆裝置的預設實作會傳回`true`。The default implementation based on the underlying default stylus device always returns `true`. 不過，如果可延伸提供輸入系統的裝置實作的輸入的裝置，則可以替代手寫筆裝置的實作可能會傳回不同的結果，以建立系統。However, if you are extending the input devices that provide the device implementation for the input system, it is possible to create a system with an alternative stylus device implementation that might return different results. 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使手寫筆在其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the stylus is outside its bounds. 通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取手寫筆。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 呼叫這個方法會呼叫基礎靜態方法。Calling this method calls an underlying static method . 實際擷取行為的實作方法的使用中的手寫筆裝置的實作。The actual capture behavior is implemented by the active stylus device implementation. 若要擷取項目都必須啟用。To be captured, an element must be enabled. 檢查是否是`true`傳回才能呼叫。Check whether is `true` return before you call . 如果呼叫傳回`true`，也`true`。If calling returns `true`, is also `true`. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Focus() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試在項目上設定邏輯焦點。

span.span: Attempts to set the logical focus on this element.

returns.span: 如果邏輯與鍵盤焦點皆設定至此項目則為 ，如果只有設定邏輯焦點則為 。

span.span: if both logical and keyboard focus were set to this element; if only logical focus was set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要可設定焦點，和兩者都必須是`true`。To be focusable, and must both be `true`. 即使項目是在特定的樹狀結構中的可設定焦點且已啟用，事件處理，（例如，針對複合控制項） 可能會回應預覽焦點事件藉由禁止焦點，因此這個方法會傳回`false`。Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`. 如果呼叫傳回`true`，和也`true`。If calling returns `true`, and are also `true`. 如果相關的屬性尚未`true`，當您呼叫，一或多個下列事件會依照下列順序引發： ， （來源為新的焦點目標） ， ，， （來源為新的焦點目標）。If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call , one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: , (source is the new focus target), , , , (source is the new focus target). 為了讓這個呼叫才會成功，應用程式中的某個其他項目需要先前有焦點。In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously. 焦點通常由兩個不同的概念： 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點，並不一定相同。Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical. 此方法會設定邏輯焦點，而且嘗試設定鍵盤焦點。This method sets the logical focus, and also attempts to set the keyboard focus. 沒有任何程式設計的方法，來設定鍵盤焦點具體來說，這是由使用者輸入。There is no programmatic means to set keyboard focus specifically, this happens due to user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定元素是否能夠接收焦點的值。

value.span: 如果項目可設定焦點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is focusable; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有已取得焦點的項目收到鍵盤輸入。Only the focused element receives keyboard input. 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]實際上會相依性屬性的屬性存取子。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property. 這個特定的相依性屬性相當常有衍生的項目類別中以不同的方式設定其明顯"default"值。This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes. 這通常會發生在兩種方式之一：This commonly occurs in one of two ways: - 相依性屬性繼承自特定的衍生類別，但是，衍生類別覆寫之相依性屬性的中繼資料，並變更屬性的預設值。The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果沒有視覺化父項目存在，則會為這個項目傳回替代的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an alternative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] parent for this element if no visual parent exists.

returns.span: 一個物件，如果衍生類別的實作有替代父代連接要報告。

span.span: An object, if implementation of a derived class has an alternate parent connection to report.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的虛擬實作這個方法會傳回`null`。The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`. 提供實際的實作。 provides a practical implementation. 替代的父代是用於事件的路由，在其中項目會建立替代父結構，讓它的事件會路由傳送偏離標準模式的視覺化樹狀目錄以標準的父代，路由的方式的情況下或在中向下預覽路由策略。Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 此元素取得邏輯焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同的範圍與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中，鍵盤焦點會維持其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目已從`false`至`true`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，接收焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly GotFocusEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotKeyboardFocus As KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是類似的事件可追蹤之屬性維護的項目; 焦點狀態中的狀態變更的許多相同的情況下，就會引發事件。 is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the event is raised in many of the same circumstances. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為具有焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際具有焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotMouseCapture As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素擷取滑鼠時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使將滑鼠指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取並且擷取之前拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查資料，以判斷實際項目具有滑鼠擷取的事件。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使指標位於其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 手寫筆通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取，並保留擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷已擷取的實際項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture. 此事件會建立這個類別的附加事件的別名，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 取得與此元素關聯的輸入繫結集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of input bindings associated with this element.

value.span: 輸入繫結的集合。

span.span: The collection of input bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入繫結支援命令與輸入裝置繫的結。Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices. 例如，實作輸入包含的滑鼠裝置特定內容的繫結。For example, implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices. 輸入繫結的集合會包含屬於此類型的輸入繫結以及宣告執行個體的輸入繫結。The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance. 相關的屬性， ，維持命令繫結的集合。A related property, , maintains a collection of command bindings. 這些不同從輸入繫結，因為它們代表的下一個層級的動作會繫結至已知命令的命令處理。These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreInputBindings**oneOrMoreInputBindings* 一或多個項目 (通常或衍生類別)。One or more elements (typically the or derived classes). 每一個都應該要有和屬性設定。Each of these is expected to have a and attribute set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateModel() cil managed

summary.span: 讓代表項目的模型失效。

span.span: Invalidates the model that represents the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您衍生自類別，您可以使用這個方法並搭配方法，以重新整理模型的項目。When you derive a class from the class, you can use this method together with the method to refresh the model of the element. 您只需要在進階案例中呼叫這個方法。You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios. 這類進階的案例之一就是在衍生的類別有多個屬性會影響外觀，並且您想要一次更新基礎的模型。One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立`Sphere`類別：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[UIElement3D 球體範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意這個屬性會受到特定類別的實作特定項目，通常在執行階段。Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of on particular elements, often at runtime. 因此，此處所列的預設值有時不是有效。Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective. 嘗試設定此值將也可能會覆寫所傳回的值。Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by . 未啟用的項目不會參與點擊測試或焦點，而且不會因此輸入事件的來源。Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某個應用程式多個焦點分區，例如功能表內容和應用程式的其餘部分之間，可能會與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application. 在此案例中，應用程式 UI 的一個項目上只能是鍵盤焦點，不過，其他焦點分割中的特定項目可能仍會保留邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus. 如需有關邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 您未設定此屬性 （它是唯讀） 設定焦點。You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only). 這個屬性的典型用法就是使用它作為相依性屬性的或。The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a or . 若要以程式設計方式設定焦點，呼叫。To set focus programmatically, call . 藉由使用者動作或控制項實作，其中可能包括滑鼠捕捉行為，也可以設定焦點。Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定宣告此元素是否可以從其呈現內容的某些部分傳回，作為點擊測試結果的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether this element can possibly be returned as a hit test result from some portion of its rendered content.

value.span: 如果這個項目可從至少一個點當做點擊測試結果傳回則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this element could be returned as a hit test result from at least one point; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的有效值會受到點擊測試的項目邏輯樹狀中的相對位置。The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree. 比方說，如果某個元素的子元素的項目，不會叫用測試顯示，將會繼續的子系上屬性的有效值`false`，即使嘗試在本機設定該值。For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally. 基於這個理由，請務必確認您未設定至`false`複合控制項上，除非您不想要的任何輸入或的點擊測試該控制項。For this reason, it is important that you do not set to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control. 如需點擊測試的詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺分層中的點擊測試](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 決定的值，這個屬性的變更可能會伴隨焦點相關事件。Changes to the determined value of this property may be accompanied by focus-related events. 和常用類別事件處理常式中的其他輸入相關的事件，例如來決定項目已經有鍵盤焦點，或進行決定當滑鼠事件和鍵盤事件一起出現。 and are commonly used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對這個屬性的值的變更通常引發事件，除非在衍生的類別已覆寫来隱藏的事件。Changes to the value of this property typically raise the event, unless a derived class has overridden to suppress the event. 您未設定這個屬性，但您也可以呼叫的項目設定焦點，或藉由要求。You do not set this property directly, but you can set the focus to an element by calling , or by making a request. 這些方法會呼叫其中一項可能會變更這個屬性值。Either of these method calls might change this property value. 和通常用於類別的事件處理常式中其他輸入相關的事件，例如來決定項目已經有鍵盤焦點，或進行決定當滑鼠事件和鍵盤事件一起出現。 and are typically used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果滑鼠指標常值的項目，因為其適用於點擊測試。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element—as it is for a hit test. 如果滑鼠指標改為子項目，這個屬性會是`false`。If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, this property will be `false`. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果將滑鼠擷取由這個項目，而且這個屬性為`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會繼續傳回`true`直到失去滑鼠捕捉但其範圍不是指標。If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，控制項是複合的控制項 （視覺化樹狀結構） 內的各種項目都會報告包含控制項的滑鼠狀態。Typically, controls are composited such that the various elements inside the control (the visual tree) will all report the mouse state for the containing control. 例如，樣式控制項將會報告為`true`如果滑鼠任意處是它的幾何，包括任何。For example, a style control will report as `true` if the mouse is anywhere over its geometry, including any . 雖然類似"IsMouseOverChanged 」 事件不存在，便會執行數個類似的事件。Although an analogous "IsMouseOverChanged" event does not exist, several similar events do. 例如，您可以處理， ，和。For example, you can handle , , and . 如果此元素擷取滑鼠，這個屬性會保留`true`直到已失去滑鼠捕捉滑鼠指標離開項目範圍。If this element captures the mouse, this property remains `true` until mouse capture is lost and the mouse pointer leaves the element bounds. 有些控制項刻意捕捉滑鼠上似乎沒有直接牽涉到滑鼠特定動作。Some controls deliberately capture the mouse on certain actions that do not appear to directly involve the mouse. 這可能會導致正在`true`即使看似沒有移動滑鼠。This can lead to being `true` even though the mouse has not apparently moved. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果手寫筆在元素上方。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element. 如果手寫筆改為透過子元素或元素的更深入的複合 （視覺化樹狀結構） 的一部分的項目，這個屬性會是`false`。If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing (the visual tree), this property will be `false`. 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，而且這個屬性是`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會保持`true`直到手寫筆擷取遺失，且其範圍不是手寫筆。If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷值會考量許多因素而定。Determination of the value takes many factors into account. 相反地， ，這是可設定的屬性，只表示要以程式設計的方式讓項目，可見或不可見。In contrast, , which is a settable property, only indicates the intention to programmatically make an element visible or invisible. 這個屬性的值的變更通常會引發事件。Changes to the value of this property will typically raise the event. 沒有相符[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]」 上 \* 」 類別處理覆寫方法，讓某些衍生類別覆寫該行為，以及處理事件，但仍無法直接使用附加的類別處理常式。There is no matching [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] "On\*" class handling override method that would allow some derived class to override that behavior and handle the event, but a class handler could still be attached directly with . 項目位置是`false`參與輸入的事件 （或命令），請執行不影響量值或排列傳遞的版面配置，不是可設定焦點、 索引標籤順序而且不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is `false` do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the measure or arrange passes of layout, are not focusable, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 相較之下，項目位置是`false`仍會參與事件和命令，以及點擊測試，但是也不是可設定焦點。In contrast, elements where is `false` will still participate in events and commands, and hit testing, but are also not focusable. 不是要做為樣式的觸發程序。 is not intended to be used as a style trigger. 使用為樣式觸發程序可能會有無法預期的結果。Using as a style trigger might have unpredictable results. 適用於較低層級的輸入實作所檢查的狀態。 is intended for state checking by lower level input implementations. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LostFocus As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素失去邏輯焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同範圍中，則邏輯焦點會與鍵盤焦點不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中、 鍵盤焦點會維持為，其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目從變更`true`至`false`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去擷取項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際遺失擷取的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制項可能會繼承的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 雖然時滑鼠指標進入項目的邊界時發生，此事件的詳細追蹤逐字報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 滑鼠指標離開此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 雖然曲目，當滑鼠離開項目時，此事件多逐字報告屬性值已經從`true`至`false`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse leaves an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseLeaveEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeaveEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseRightButtonUp As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且放開滑鼠右按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素上方放開任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應至其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的版本。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且使用者滾動滑鼠滾輪時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到事件從取得焦點或擷取的項目，將滑鼠指標可能實際上是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 嘗試將焦點從這個項目移至另一個項目。

summary.span: 移動焦點的方向是由指引方向所指定，該指引方向是在這個項目之視覺化父代的組織內解譯。

span.span: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.

returns.span: 如果已執行要求的周遊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請確定您檢查此方法的傳回值。Make sure you check the return value of this method. 傳回值為`false`如果周遊時碰到的定位點由控制項的組合所定義，並周遊要求未包裝要求可能會傳回。A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

param.name: e
param.span: 便捷鍵事件的事件資料。

span.span: The event data to the access key event.

param.span: 該事件資料會報告叫用哪個便捷鍵，並指出控制這些事件之傳送的 物件，是否也會將這個便捷鍵引動過程傳送至其他項目。

span.span: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.

summary.span: 當叫用對這個項目有意義的便捷鍵 (Access Key) 時，為其提供類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任何實際 AccessKey 事件類別，或其他位置，您可以引發或附加的處理常式。There is no actual AccessKey event in the class, or elsewhere, which you can raise or attach handlers for. 相反地，透過專用的管理員類別，產生事件，其中進行後置處理所有輸入来搜尋適用於整個輸入模型的存取金鑰。Instead, the event is originated via a dedicated manager class, , which post-processes all input to search for access keys that are applicable to the entire input model. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 這個方法中的預設實作設定鍵盤焦點移到這個項目 (藉由呼叫)。

span.span: The default implementation of this method in sets keyboard focus to this element (by calling ).

para.span: 如果它們是可設定焦點，因為它是協助工具案例中的預期的行為的實作應該延續此行為。

span.span: Implementations should perpetuate this behavior if they are focusable, because it is an expected behavior for accessibility scenarios.

para.span: 請注意，基底實作不做任何動作與傳遞的事件資料，而且會引發任何進一步的事件。它只會將焦點。

span.span: Note that the base implementation does nothing with the passed event data and raises no further event; it just sets the focus.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: A that contains event data.

param.span: 此事件資料必須包含 事件的識別項。

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此虛擬方法時，會呼叫的值相依性屬性變更。This virtual method is called when the value of the dependency property changes. 會先呼叫虛擬方法，並可以操作需要的事件資料。The virtual method is called first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 然後在與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 請注意，事件就不會路由的事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnKeyUp(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnKeyUp (e As KeyEventArgs)

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnLostFocus(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnLostFocus (e As RoutedEventArgs)

param.name: e

span.span: A that contains event data.

param.span: 此事件資料必須包含 事件的識別項。

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data that is provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
