remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是具有直接路由策略的路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體的處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

不過，此覆寫停用內容功能表上的服務您的控制項，也就是組件的預設行為。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnPreviewDragLeave (System.Windows.DragEventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewDragLeave(class System.Windows.DragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreviewDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)

由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 事件資料會報告滑鼠左鍵已按下。

summary.span: 當未處理的 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

不過，此覆寫停用內容功能表上的服務您的控制項，也就是組件的預設行為。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 事件資料會報告一個或多個滑鼠按鈕已釋放。

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnStylusInRange (e As StylusEventArgs)

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a touch presses inside this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法有預設的實作。The method has no default implementation. 覆寫處理衍生類別中事件。Override in a derived class to handle the event. 確定呼叫基底類別的方法的基底類別，接收到事件。Be sure to call the base class’s method so that base classes receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您衍生自類別，您可以使用這個方法並搭配方法，以重新整理模型的項目。When you derive a class from the class, you can use this method together with the method to refresh the model of the element. 您只需要在進階案例中呼叫這個方法。You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios. 這類進階的案例之一就是在衍生的類別有多個屬性會影響外觀，並且您想要一次更新基礎的模型。One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once. 內方法無法更新屬性類別。Within the method you could update the property of the class. 這個方法有預設的實作類別。This method has no default implementation in the class. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立`Sphere`類別：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[UIElement3D 球體範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

summary.span: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點且按下按鍵時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件使用通道路由，因為失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循通道路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且移動滑鼠指標時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 都會發生這個事件項目界限，第一次進入滑鼠指標時，也會在滑鼠指標移時仍保持項目範圍內。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseMoveEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseRightButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠右按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循通道路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseRightButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到這個事件與已取得焦點或擷取的項目時，滑鼠指標實際上可能是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手寫筆筆勢的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about stylus gestures, see . 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式; 但也可以產生語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: 要求顯示游標時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每當滑鼠指標移動至新位置時，都會引發此事件，這意謂游標物件可能會根據其新位置而變更。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 這個事件名稱所參考的資料指標不一定是文字游標 （有時稱為插入點）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反地，此內容中的資料指標是宣告畫面的圖形化顯示數個可能的輸入相關裝置或中的概念相關的物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win-md.md)]程式設計。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win-md.md)] programming. 該物件由類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。That object is represented by the class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的系統可讓您變更這個資料指標，它代表在螢幕上的滑鼠指標位置時。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 您可以使用預先定義的值從列舉型別，或者您可以宣告為影像檔的自訂資料指標。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 接聽事件就不會針對資料指標管理而有效率的技術。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反地，每個項目應該定義自己的資料指標行為和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您只應依賴如果您不想要使用的 WPF 架構層級基底項目，或在異常的情況下，其中定義以每個項目為基礎的資料指標的行為不符合您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 如需有關在回應中實作資料指標行為，請參閱。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

param.span: ，其包含事件資料，也會識別要引發的事件。

summary.span: 引發特定路由事件。

summary.span: 要引發的 是在所提供的 執行個體內被識別 (該執行個體是提供做為該事件資料的 屬性)。

span.span: The to be raised is identified within the instance that is provided (as the property of that event data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`參數的型別做為路由的事件的所有資料的通用基底類型; 不過，應該指定事件資料為最特定的事件資料類型是適用於所引發的事件，因為衍生的類別包含實際的特定資料是針對特定事件時引發此事件的屬性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 沒有狀態內容事件。它也會識別要引發哪個路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引發模式且同時與不同的路由的事件資料[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和資料類別，通常只包含與事件相關的屬性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 如果這個項目保有滑鼠捕捉，則釋放捕捉。

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed
public: virtual void RemoveHandler(System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler);

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要附加處理常式之路由事件的識別項。

span.span: The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.

param.name: handler
param.span: 要從這個項目上的事件處理常式集合中移除的特定處理常式實作。

span.span: The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.

summary.span: 從這個項目中移除指定的路由事件處理常式。

span.span: Removes the specified routed event handler from this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的案例使用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是當您實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自訂路由事件，特別是當您實作在處理常式的 「 移除 」 邏輯時相關聯的 「 包裝函式 」 事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]層級。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 如果沒有任何處理常式註冊以比對方法呼叫的輸入的參數的準則，則呼叫這個方法任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that match the input parameters for the method call. 如果一個以上的處理常式附加事件處理常式存放區會移除比對準則，第一個處理常式。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 這個行為會與一致[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行為`-=`運算子。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也`handler`可能`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 嘗試在提供做為任一個值`null`會引發例外狀況。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 這個方法會忽略`handledEventsToo`加上參數資訊，如果第一個處理常式提供簽章，可讓已處理事件的處理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 會移除任一類型的處理常式。Either type of handler is removed. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 傳回序列化 (Serialization) 處理序是否應該在這個類別的執行個體上，將 屬性的內容序列化。

span.span: Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the contents of the property on instances of this class.

returns.span: 如果應序列化 屬性值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會傳回`true`如果本機設定。This will return `true` if is locally set. 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果在開發設計師或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer or developing your own control incorporating a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[定義預設值使用 ShouldSerialize 和重設方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 手寫筆指標在此元素上方且按下手寫筆按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 手寫筆進入此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然當手寫筆進入範圍的項目，這個多個事件的追蹤依其字面報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus moves over an element without actually touching the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 手寫筆離開元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus leaves the bounds of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然時手寫筆離開範圍的項目，此事件的多個追蹤逐字報告屬性值已經從`true`至`false`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus leaves the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextInput As TextCompositionEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式，但也可以引發語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 手指在這個項目上方且在螢幕上觸控時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會影響值，其接著可能會引發事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 不過，有其他因素影響，例如包含它的父代的可見性設定。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 項目位置不不會參與輸入的事件 （或命令），並不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands) and are not reported in hit testing. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
